description: Stores order information and order details
business_context: Tracks all customer orders with status tracking from pending to completed. Links to customers and contains order_items.

customer_id.description: References the customer who placed the order

status.description: Current status of the order lifecycle

relationships.description: Each order belongs to one customer
One order can have many order items

example_queries: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed' AND order_date > '2024-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id
